reviews_name: PlayKeyboard – Create a Theme, Emojis, Shortcuts APK

detail_application.Name: PlayKeyboard – Create a Theme, Emojis, Shortcuts
detail_application.descriptions:
⭐️Verified from 213 countries ⭐️ Best keyboard on earth 🌎
Finally Arrived! 🌸Keyboard that Reacts to you 🌸

• Cute characters live with you inside the keyboard!
• “I’m happy when you’re happy… ꒰⸝⸝•。•⸝⸝꒱ ” keyboard reacts to my word!
• laughs with you when typing ‘lol’, dances lovely when typing ‘love’
Take ‘anything’ you want 🌈 DIY Keyboard ! 🌈

• Download, share ‘anytheme’ you want!
• 200+ themes ready for you!
• Decorate keyboard with your Bae! Custom Image and GIFS inside Keyboard! 💕
Not only Beautiful 👏 but also Convenient 👏👏

• Shortcuts : Type ‘lolol’ by single click 😎
• Boilerplate : Touch only once to type any frequently used words!
• Text – emojis : (~˘▾˘)~ Trendy text-emojis only for you ~(˘▾˘~)
Permission Required
Storage: Used to save or load your own theme
Phone: It will be used to call up your phone number automatically and save it to 'Boilerplate'
Address Book: It will be used to automatically load and save your email to 'Boilerplate'
What’s New
v0.9.14 Updates 🎉
Thank you for using PlayKeyboard!
Added keyboard height / margin
You can now set height / margin for each keyboard width / length mode.🧡
Added keyboard text size and bold text settings
You can set the font size and thick text on the keyboard! 😎
The bigger them icon!
Cute themes will now look more attractive 😍
Various other bugs have been fixed!
⭐️ If you are satisfied with the update, please rate more stars: D ⭐️
